title: Classical Greece: Democracy and Philosophy

vocab.definition: Government by the people, especially rule of the majority
Independent political unit consisting of a city and surrounding territory
Love of wisdom; systematic study of fundamental questions
Teaching through questioning to stimulate critical thinking
Period of great cultural and intellectual achievement

teachingNotes: Emphasize Greek contributions to democracy and philosophy. Discuss the influence on modern government and thought.

sample.question: What is government by the people called?

truefalse.question: A city-state is an independent political unit with a city and surrounding territory.

multiplechoice.question: What teaching method uses questioning to stimulate thinking?

fillintheblank.question: The systematic study of fundamental questions is called ________.

shortanswer.question: How did Athenian democracy differ from modern democracy?
